articles.title: People Are Sharing The Things They Wish They'd Known About Sex Before Having It, And They're All Valuable Lessons
articles.description: "Having sex for the first time doesn’t change who you are as a person. I’d been taught by religious, abstinence-only sources that once you had sex (outside of marriage), your whole personality would change. You’d become sex-obsessed, rebellious, aggressive, b…

articles.author: Kelly Martinez
articles.title: 11 Movies That Went Through A Shocking Amount Of Rewrites, Changes, Or Behind-The-Scenes Drama
articles.description: On the opening weekend of Fantastic Four (2015), director Josh Trank wrote in a since-deleted tweet: "A year ago, I had a fantastic version of this. And it would have received great reviews. You’ll probably never see it. That’s reality though."

articles.author: Syd Robinson
articles.title: 21 Former Reality And Game Show Contestants Are Sharing Their Wildest Behind-The-Scenes Secrets And Stories, And OMG
articles.description: "I have been to Carlo's Bakery, aka the bakery from Cake Boss. While there, we learned that the 'wedding' they were filming in Italy was completely faked, and they never actually got married. Kind of ruined the whole experience for me."
articles.content: "The day of taping, we were bussed from the hotel to Sony Pictures Studios at 6 a.m. There were 18 contestants plus two LA-based alternates in case anyone needed to drop out last minute. The entire m… [+891 chars]
